resources.string:
This service allows the AI Automation Assistant to perform automated touch actions and gestures on your behalf. 

The service can: 
• Tap, swipe, and perform gestures 
• Read screen content for pattern recognition 
• Execute learned automation sequences 

Your privacy is important. All data is stored locally on your device and never transmitted elsewhere.
Overlay permission is required for the floating widget
Accessibility permission is required for automation
